name: Project A.I.M
description:
Mocksharrons are invasive species from another dimension terraforming and destroying other worlds.

With a zealot determination, it allows them to easily overtake and conquer.

They now have their EYE set on invading Allnoria the home planet of the Allnorians.

Unbeknownst to the Mocksharrons the Allnorians have (Project A.I.M), an elite task force of pilot’s and machines capable of defending their home world.

Features 

  • 4 playable ships each with their own handling, special ability, and personal stories.
  • 2 main weapons.
  • 4 hand crafted detailed levels. 
  • Graded scoring system. 

Install instructions

 Unzip and launch the ProjectAIM.exe
